Contributor: Embru, Clotilde, artist.; American Women's Hospitals, publisher.; Acme Litho. Co., lithographer.;
Note: Signed "Clotilde Embru." Date based on America's participation in the war. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Text says to help the American Women's Hospitals campaign for Serbia and the Near East. They will be able to help the victims. Illustration shows a women representing the American Women's Hospital trying to help a young women holding an ill baby.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: Help us to help them
